metadata.title: CVE-2020-24242 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.15rc10, SEGV can be triggered in tok_text inasm/preproc.c by accessing READ memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24242` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.15.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.04-1').
